com.wizzer.mle.parts.sets

Class Mle2dSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleSet
      • com.wizzer.mle.parts.sets.Mle2dSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d.sets.I2dSet, com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.IMleObject, com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.IMleSet

    public class Mle2dSet
extends com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleSet
implements com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d.sets.I2dSet
    This class implements a Set that can be used for 2.5D applications.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  Mle2dSet.Mle2dSetResizeCallback
      This inner class is used to process resize events.

    • Field Detail

      • m_renderCBId

        protected com.wizzer.mle.runtime.scheduler.MleTask m_renderCBId
        Render callback id (scheduler).

      • m_resizeCBId

        protected com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.IMleCallbackId m_resizeCBId

        The Image to render into.

      • position

        public com.wizzer.mle.math.MlVector2 position
        Contains x and y position in screen coordinate space; (0, 0) corresponds to the lower left corner of the window.

      • size

        public com.wizzer.mle.math.MlVector2 size
        Contains width and height in screen coordinate space.

      • m_headRole

        protected com.wizzer.mle.parts.roles.Mle2dRole m_headRole
        The m_headRole is the first Role drawn. This makes the m_headRole always appear in the bottom layer among all the Roles attached to this Set. Similiarly, the last Role in this list always appears on the top layer.

      • m_resizeEventCB

        protected Mle2dSet.Mle2dSetResizeCallback m_resizeEventCB
        The resize event callback.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mle2dSet

        public Mle2dSet()
        The default constructor.

        The default position is set to (0,0). The default size is set to 640x480.

      • attachRoles

        public void attachRoles(com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRole curR,
                        com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRole newR)
                 throws com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRuntimeException
        Attach newR after curR. If curR is null, newR is attached to the end of the list.
        Specified by:
        attachRoles in interface com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d.sets.I2dSet
        Specified by:
        attachRoles in class com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleSet
        Parameters:
        curR - The Role to attach to. May be null
        newR - The Role to attach.
        Throws:
        com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if newR is null.

      • detach

        public void detach(com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRole curR)
            throws com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRuntimeException
        Detach specified Role from the layer list.
        Specified by:
        detach in interface com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d.sets.I2dSet
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • setRenderCBId

        public void setRenderCBId(com.wizzer.mle.runtime.scheduler.MleTask id)
        This method is used to set the scheduler id for the render method (so that we can remove it during destruction).
        Parameters:
        id - The task identifier for the render callback.

      • handleResizeEvent

        public boolean handleResizeEvent(com.wizzer.mle.parts.stages.Mle2dStage theStage)
        Handle the resize event.
        Parameters:
        theStage - The Stage associated with this Set.
        Returns:
        true is returned if the resize event is successfully handled. Otherwise, false is returned.
